title: So....another chat ban
body:
Game 1
In-Game
Me: suck my dik u piece of shit noob
Me: stfu
Me: fuck off u piece of shit iron feeder
Me: why the fuck is a piece of garbage like u not in iron yet?
Me: SENNA SAYS SHE WAS PLAT LAST SEASON!!!
Me: OMG
Me: THX BRO U REALLY MADE ME LAUGH
Me: our 60 cs senna was plat last season
Me: he camped u cuz u easy
Me: u dont camp someone cuz they are good
Me: u camp them cuz they shit
Me: lux is the only reason ur not like 0-10

Me: fuck off

replies.body:
>I regret nothing. Fuck that noob.
>Also, you're right. I'm not remorseful or confused.

This board is for asking for help in reforming your behavior. Since you've clearly indicated otherwise, I'm locking this post.

If you have any questions about this moderation action, don't hesitate to reach out to the Boards Moderation Team via:

* The [**NA Boards Discord**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/7rtKBZLi-boards-moderation-discord-verification)
* The [**Discuss the Boards**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation) sub-board

What's the point of the post? You don't sound confused about your punishment nor do you sound remorseful.

Where does the discussion go from here? Because all I can see is either people saying that you deserve it and should repent or that you should continue misbehaving because fuck the system. Neither line of discussion leads to anything useful.

I've had so much laughter reading people's chat in this section. I though I'd give a little something back.

Also, you're right. I'm not remorseful or confused. I understood fully what I was doing and didn't care. I'd do it again too. Only thing I regret is not going all out. I held back but if I knew that I was 100% going to get a chat ban, then this would have been way more spicy. So much more shit I wanted to tell that noob.

> [{quoted}](name=FioraWillCarry,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=E5uaEmrI,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2020-01-18T19:19:46.824+0000)

> I've had so much laughter reading people's chat in this section. I though I'd give a little something back.

I expected nothing and yet I'm still disappointed.
There is a rant board for you to post like this. The PB board is for discussion. There is no discussion here.
Not a rant. Just felt like boasting about my latest chat ban.

> I regret nothing. Fuck that noob.

So...What exactly is the point of this post? There's clearly nothing here to discuss, since you seem perfectly aware of why you got punished and don't seem to have any interest in changing your behavior.
It's like one of those streams on twitch....."just chatting"
Do you behave like that on this level 249 account, or on a smurf you don't care about?

This account was wrongfully perm'd a year ago. All I have now is a bunch of level 30ish accounts. Interestingly when your main gets perm'd, you care a whole lot less about being on your best behavior. You realize that the account was never really yours to begin with and at the end of the day it's just a bunch of ones and zeros on a server somewhere. Like who gives a fuck. I don't care, a chat ban here, a 14 days there. Like it's whatever. Tell you what though. I had fun abusing that little shit in game. Like I said. I regret nothing.
